Verses: 2 naan Uyirodirukkumattum Karththaraith Thudhippen; Naan Ullalavum En Dhevanaik Keerththanampannuven.
4 avanudaiya Aavi Piriyum, Avan Than Mannukkuth Thirumbuvaan; Annaalile Avan Yosanaigal Azhindhupom.
5 yaakkobin Dhevanaith Than Thunaiyaagak Kondirundhu, Than Dhevanaagiya Karththarmel Nambikkaiyai Vaikkiravan Baakkiyavaan.
6 avar Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Samuththiraththaiyum Avaigalilulla Yaavaiyum Undaakkinavar; Avar Endrendraikkum Unmaiyaik Kaakkiravar.
7 avar Odukkappattavargalukku Niyaayanseygiraar; Pasiyaayirukkiravargalukku Aagaarang Kodukkiraar; Kattundavargalaik Karththar Vidudhalaiyaakkugiraar.
8 kurudarin Kangalaik Karththar Thirakkiraar; Madangadikkappattavargalaik Karththar Thookkividugiraar; Needhimaangalaik Karththar Sinegikkiraar.
9 paradhesigalaik Karththar Kaappaatrugiraar; Avar Thikkatra Pillaiyaiyum Vidhavaiyaiyum Aadharikkiraar; Dhunmaarkkarin Vazhiyaiyo Kavizhththuppodugiraar.
10 karththar Sadhaagaalangalilum Arasaalugiraar; Seeyone, Un Dhevan Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaagavum Raajarigampannugiraar. Allelooyaa.
